info.name: Smart Home IoT API
info.description: Postman collection for testing Smart Home FastAPI endpoints (IoT data, commands, monitoring).

item.name: Check API Status
item.description: Checks if the API server is online.

item.name: Insert Sensor Data
item.description: Inserts new sensor data from IoT device.

item.name: Get Sensor Data
item.description: Retrieves all recorded sensor data from the database.

item.name: Send Command to Device
item.description: Sends a control command to the IoT device via MQTT.
